search.query: `isilon_index` sourcetype="emc:isilon:syslog" audit_protocol | dedup Cluster_Name | table Cluster_Name
| inputlookup "dell_isilon_username" | eval key=_key | rename key as unique_key_field | eval username = (username + " (" + host + ")") | table username unique_key_field
`isilon_index` sourcetype="emc:isilon:syslog" audit_protocol Cluster_Name=$cluster_name$ | dedup event_action | table event_action
`isilon_index` sourcetype="emc:isilon:syslog" event_result=* audit_protocol Cluster_Name=$cluster_name$ | dedup event_result | table event_result

input.label: Path of the file to search

search.query: `isilon_index` sourcetype="emc:isilon:syslog" audit_protocol Cluster_Name=$cluster_name$ event_action="$action$" file_path="$path$" event_result="$result$" | fillnull value="N/A" uid | eval host_to_pass = case($name|s$=="*", "", $name|s$=="N/A", "", 1==1, mvindex(split($name|s$,"||"),0)), uid_to_pass = case($name|s$=="*", "", $name|s$=="N/A", "N/A", 1==1, mvindex(split($name|s$,"||"),1)) | where like(host, "%".'host_to_pass'."%") AND like(uid, "%".'uid_to_pass'."%") | eval Time=strftime(_time,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S") | lookup "dell_isilon_username" uid host OUTPUTNEW username | fillnull value="N/A" username | table Time Cluster_Name username event_action event_result file_path client_ip | rename username as "User" event_action as "Action Taken" event_result as "Result of action" file_path as "File Name" client_ip as "Source IP Address" Cluster_Name as "Cluster"
